name: stopn't
description:
your ship's acceleration module broke, and there's a bomb in the engine! keep up speed, don't crash, and stay alive for as long as possible.

game by:
- cai jones (audio)
- cat flynn (programming, tech art)
- cinder foster-smith (programming, ui)
- dan coady (art, level design)
- kyung-min chung (art, art direction)
